snippet: Scooter Braun is assembling a group of managers and musicians, and raising an investment fund intended to strengthen their position in the music industry, people with knowledge of the plan say.
abstract: Scooter Braun, manager of hit acts like Justin Bieber, is said to be assembling group of managers and musicians, raising investment fund intended to strengthen their position in music industry.
lead_paragraph: Scooter Braun is assembling a group of managers and musicians, and raising an investment fund intended to strengthen their position in the music industry, people with knowledge of the plan say.

headline.main: Bieber’s Manager Starts Music Investment Fund
headline.print_headline: Bieber’s Manager Starts Music Investment Fund
